title: Can I use External Mic Rode SmartLav for Pixel 3 with Adaptors?
content:
Hi, 

I'd like to use an external mic, such as the Rode SmartLav with my Pixel 3?

It seems I need:
External Sound Card USB Audio Adapter.
A USB to USB-C adapter.

Does this work? Do I need anything additional such as a sound app? 

I've done research on the Rode website, Reddit, Amazon, and elsewhere and just want to make sure.

Thanks in advance! Steve
